references.paper_title: Optimal algorithms for online convex optimization with multi-point bandit feedback
references.reason: This paper provides optimal algorithms for online convex optimization with multi-point bandit feedback, which is foundational for the current work on bandit convex optimization with delayed feedback.

references.paper_title: Online convex optimization in the bandit setting: Gradient descent without a gradient
references.reason: This paper introduces the bandit gradient descent algorithm, which is a fundamental algorithm for bandit convex optimization and is extended in this paper to the delayed feedback setting.

references.paper_title: No weighted-regret learning in adversarial bandits with delays
references.reason: This paper provides a state-of-the-art regret bound for bandit convex optimization with delayed feedback and establishes a lower bound which helps to contextualize the improvement made in this paper.

references.paper_title: Gradient-free online learning in games with delayed rewards
references.reason: This paper is among the first to address bandit convex optimization with delayed feedback, proposing the GOLD algorithm whose regret bound is improved upon by this paper.

references.paper_title: On delayed prediction of individual sequences
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the study of online convex optimization with delays, establishing important lower bounds that this paper builds upon.
